body:
If you can export these formats: 3ds, obj, dxf, there are tools to convert to Radiance.
dxf2rad
3ds2rad
obj2rad
obj2mesh


Or into Sketchup or Blender that have a Radiance plugins


Rob F


-----Original Message-----
